data.title: HG
data.text: Finally a healthy place to come and get a juice, salad, crepe, smoothie the list goes on & on. Nice, friendly, fast service.

data.title: Healthy Little Gem
data.text: WoW - a fresh juice bar in the middle of all the wineries!  Amid all the heavy starchy pasta, enchilada, pizza & burger food downtown offers, here is a refreshing little gem where you can get a salad, fruit cup, or fresh squeezed juice to go.  My first visit for lunch I ordered the turkey crepe with tomato pesto. It was scrumptious & light.  I sipped on citrus infused water as I waited.  My friend & I stopped here for fruit cups the other day when it was hot.  The fruits were cut up as we watched.  Fresh, cool & crispy, so good and large cups too.  They offer fresh fruit crepes as well, smoothies - OMyGosh - the chalkboard menu goes on & on. Many choices & combos.  Check it out while strolling downtown.
